controller.hitKing

Interface IHitKingChecker

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractHitKingChecker, BishopHitKingChecker, KingHitKingChecker, KnightHitKingChecker, PawnHitKingChecker, QueenHitKingChecker, RookHitKingChecker

    public interface IHitKingChecker
    Class with this interface can check if a specific figure can hit the king.
    Author:
    Bj√∂rn Hullmann

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canHitTheKing(Point from, Point kingPos, java.util.function.Function<Point,IFigure> figureGetter)
      Check if a figure of a specific type can hit the king.
      FigureType getFigureType()

    • Method Detail

      • canHitTheKing

        boolean canHitTheKing(Point from,
                      Point kingPos,
                      java.util.function.Function<Point,IFigure> figureGetter)
        Check if a figure of a specific type can hit the king. It only check this not if the figure can reach the position without hitting the king.
        Parameters:
        from - The position where this figure stand
        kingPos - The position where there king from the other player stand
        figureGetter - A function with them the method can get for each position which figure is on this position.
        Returns:
        true if the figure can hit the king

      • getFigureType

        FigureType getFigureType()
        Get the FigureType for which this checker is
        Returns:
        The FigureType for which this is
